short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: QlikVerify Browser extension to manage Intelligent Web Apps

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
QlikVerify Browser Plugin protects your passwords and securely logs you into all your business and personal apps.

With the QlikVerify Browser Plugin you can:

*Automatically sign in to your business and personal apps with just one click
*Add your own apps into QlikVerify SSO Dashboard
*Easily access your QlikVerify dashboard apps and tabs
*Seamlessly and securely switch between multiple Okta accounts
*Bring Legacy Apps that doesnt fit to OIDC and SAML protocol

You need an QlikVerify account to use the QlikVerify Browser Plugin. If you cannot access your QlikVerify account via QlikVerify Browser Plugin, please contact your admin.
